item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 21 May 2024
item.description:
1. We Want Your Feedback on the odoc Developer Experience
  2. Windows compiler support in opam 2.2.0~beta2
  3. OCaml Workshop 2024 at ICFP -- announcement and call for proposals
  4. Odoc syntax cheatsheet
  5. DkCoder 0.2 - Scripting in OCaml
  6. Imandra SysML Transpiler Internship Opportunity!
  7. Bam - A property-based testing with internal shrinking
  8. Stitch - Note Managing for Unorganized Minimalists
  9. 7 OCaml Gotchas
  10. Using OCaml on windows with WSL
  11. Other OCaml News
